name: Kaushik Nadimpalli
bio: Kaushik is a sophomore pursuing a major in Computer Science and a minor in Business Intelligence. He is an active member of numerous organizations on campus including the UTD chapter of IntelliChoice, HackersUTD, and ACM. His goals include building and presenting interactive AI projects to establish a better bond between humans and machines. In his free time, he enjoys practicing martial arts, watching Netflix, or reading manga.
